title: I'm absolutely terrified...
body:
I'm terrified that the victorious skin will be for Azir, the chances of me getting to gold this season are basically nonexistent, and I really really really don't want to miss out on a skin like that for my favourite champ especially because you can never get it ever again, even when one day I get to gold I still won't be able to get it.
This probably sounds really silly I know but skins really make the game for me.
I don't know what to do if it is azir...
I'm terrified :S

replies.body: Riot announced that the victorious skin will be for an adc earlier this year.
No they announced that it would be a marksman, which is the secondary attribute of Azir, which is why it's very slightly possible it is Azir, however unlikely.

Historically Riot has announced the end of season rewards a few months before the ranked season ends. So as long as you get your account to level 30, you can pay for an elo boost to gold. It's not the most honourable way of getting the Victorious skin, but if you really want it that bad then this is the best way.
I forgot players do that shit. No wonder there are so many scrubs in Bronze that yell "I AM PLATINUM!!!1111!!11!"
No most of them are bullshiting, hell i had one of those bronzies, he gave me a link to a plat account.... that had a different flash key and was playing at the exact same time.
Most of them are, but some of them were once high ranked and play like shit. Probably got lucky at start of season or got boosted.
